tool_description: API that provides with drinking questions and challenges.
name: Drinking
title: Drinking

api_list.name: Get random question
api_list.description: Allows you to get a random question with optionally specifying the type of the challenge.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: You can choose question type from: funny, dirty.

api_list.name: Get random challange
api_list.description: Allows you to get a random challenge with optionally specifying the type of the challenge.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: You can choose the type from: funny, dirty, sport.
